Package Framework.Interfaces

Interface IInput

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Core
    public interface IInput
    IInput implementations access input from Env3D. Note that you may need to extend this if there are specific functions you need.
    Version:
    0.6
    Author:
    Marc Price

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getKey()
      METHOD: get keyboard input.
      int getMouseClicked()
      METHOD: check if a mouse button has been clicked.
      int[] getMousePointer()
      METHOD: check if a mouse button has been clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        int getKey()
    throws WorldDoesNotExistException
        METHOD: get keyboard input.
        Returns:
        the key value (-1 if no key has been pressed since last check).
        Throws:
        WorldDoesNotExistException

      • getMouseClicked

        int getMouseClicked()
             throws WorldDoesNotExistException
        METHOD: check if a mouse button has been clicked.
        Returns:
        the button value: 0= left button; 1= middle button; 2= right button.
        Throws:
        WorldDoesNotExistException

      • getMousePointer

        int[] getMousePointer()
               throws WorldDoesNotExistException
        METHOD: check if a mouse button has been clicked.
        Returns:
        the pointer value as a 2-element array of ints: return[0]=X, return[1]=Y.
        Throws:
        WorldDoesNotExistException
